title: Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes And Dr Watson 1979-1986 6ch-RU sub
description:
The.Adventures.Of.Sherlock.Holmes.And.Dr.Watson.1979-1986.DVDrip.6ch-RU.subs-RU-EN

The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson (1979-1986) Complete 11 Episodes
video: 720x576 AVC crf=20.00-23.75 preset=veryslow 752-1427kbps
audio: 5.1 surround Russian AC3 384-448kbps passthrough
subs1: Russian DVD picture based soft subs Default=No Forced=No passthrough
subs2: English DVD picture based soft subs Default=No Forced=No passthrough
11 mkv files: 12hour45min50sec 8,846,939,280bytes
source: DVD
IMDB: 1979-tt0079902 1980-tt0229922 1981-tt0083100 1983-tt0086333 1986-tt0091942

This is a current, high quality encode of the excellent Russian language Sherlock Holmes series from 1979-1986. The audio is Russian and there are soft subs for Russian and English. Each episode was encoded with x264 AVC at rf=20 except for s02e02=rf22.50, s03e01=rf23.25 and s03e02=rf23.75. The 5.1 surround AC3 Russian audio and the DVD picture based subs (Russian and English) were both passthrough with no re-encoding or OCR.

Filename format:
s0Xe0Y.(English title)-(abbreviation of Sherlock Holmes story source).mkv

* 1979 SEASON1 Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson
s01e01 "Acquaintance" based on the "The Adventure of the Speckled Band"
s01e02 "Bloody Inscription" based on "A Study in Scarlet"

** 1980 SEASON2 The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson
s02e01 "The King of Blackmail" based on "The Adventure of Charles Augustus Milverton"
s02e02 "Deadly Fight" based on "The Final Problem"
s02e03 "The Tiger Hunt" based on "The Adventure of the Empty House"

*** 1981 SEASON3 The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson
s03e01 "The Hound of the Baskervilles" part1
s03e02 "The Hound of the Baskervilles" part2

**** 1983 SEASON4 The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson
s04e01 "The Treasures of Agra" part1 (Сокровища агры) based on "The Sign of the Four" and "A Scandal in Bohemia"
s04e02 "The Treasures of Agra" part2 (Сокровища агры) based on "The Sign of the Four" and "A Scandal in Bohemia"

***** 1986 SEASON5 The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson
s05e01 "The Twentieth Century Approaches" part1 based on "The Engineer's Thumb", "The Second Stain", "The Bruce-Partington Plans" and "His Last Bow"
s05e02 "The Twentieth Century Approaches" part2 based on "The Engineer's Thumb", "The Second Stain", "The Bruce-Partington Plans" and "His Last Bow"

x
Wikipedia:
The films were positively received by the Soviet audience, noting the actors' masterful portrayal of the main characters and the production's attention to detail. The series became a cultural phenomenon and to this day remain a legendary masterpiece of Soviet television. In the West, the reception of the series was warm, especially in the United Kingdom. Unlike some of their Western counterparts, the films are very close to the literary source.
